THmisc 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    annotation_from_barcode()

    Get sample annotations from sample barcodes.

    annotation_from_barcode_epicc()

    EPICC Project: Get sample annotations from sqmple barcodes.

    annotation_from_barcode_tcga()

    TCGA project: Create a annotation for a vector of TCGA barcodes.

    gene_lists

    List of genes for various analysis

    get_cnas()

    Get CN annotations from a list of cn data.

    get_mutation_df()

    Get a data frame of mutation from various input formats

    get_mutation_type()

    Get the mutation type of mutations

    get_transition_type()

    Get the transition type of mutations

    indentify_vcf_type()

    Function to identify which tool created a given vcf file

    insert_vaf()

    Adds an additional VAF entry to a 'CollapsedVCF' object.

    lift_data_wrapper()

    Internal function used to lift mutation data between genome versions.

    lift_hg19_to_hg38()

    Function to lift mutations or objects between genome versions

    lift_hg38_to_hg19()

    Function to lift mutations or objects between genome versions

    load_sequenza_purity_files()

    Convience function to load Sequenza fit files.

    load_sequenza_segment_files()

    Convience function to load Sequenza segment files.

    load_vcf_file()

    Wrapper function to load arbitrary VCF files.

    long_to_short_peptide_names()

    Convert long peptide names to short ones.

    pretty_violin()

    Title

    split_multiallelic()

    Function to split multiallelic sites into multiple variants

    window_list_from_genome()

    Creates a data.frame of named tiles from a BSgenome object
